nameEn: Pour Over Coffee Filter, Stainless Steel Cone
nameTh: ไส้กรองกาแฟแบบ Stainless Steel
desc:
1. A cone coffee filter with a removable rubber grip and ring to help pour the hot water safely.
  2. Material: 304 stainless steel, Size: 12.5x11x9.5cm/4.9x4.3x3.7inch.
  3. Pour over cone for 1-4 cups for a darker and richer coffee taste.
  4. It’s easy to wash by hand or in the dishwasher when you#39;re done brewing.
  5. Double mesh can filter up to 99% coffee bean residue so that you can enjoy pure coffee, and no need to buy paper filters any more, stop paper waste protect our earth.
